title: Fragment, 13th or 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic
Technique: twill
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Paired parrots and horned quadrupeds against a background of verdant foliage. 
Entire piece has been dyed black although it was probable that it was originally in several colors.

tombstone.epitaph:
